post.body: Thanks for the follow. Interesting sports satire, I guess...
Thanks for follow! Like ur Tech blog. BTW after having lived in the Middle East, "civilians" are expendiable, really, sorry!
Thanks for the follow. You have many interesting treats. I'll never look at food gifts the same again:)
Of course your avatar is going to win:)!
Thanks for the follow! I hope you will be feeling better real soon.
Thanks for the follow! Like all ur tweets of info! Umm, I hope ur using the term mudshark meaning an enthusiastic young fan:)
Thanks for the follow! Lynchburg is a beautiful area! But of course FL is warmer this time of year:)
Gee, I don't get how the study used "Teens b4 they get married" in the same sen. Avg age for marriage is 25+! I c issue is age!
Thanks for the follow! Glad ur son made it thru surgery ok. I am beyond impressed w/ ur website. U make the USPS look good!
Thanks for the follow! Hey have you tried peacock? I hear it taste like Turkey. If you need 1 come to my neighborhood (LOL)!
Are you using the word "spam" for por...I mean...sexy chat people that have been showing up on Twitter or something else?
Wow! I bet I know who it was and I don't live in the ATL! But I'll wait for the blog.
Heard this today on XM The Groove and it made me smile:) ♫ http://blip.fm/~1cw76
Keeping it real, real old school that is:) ♫ http://blip.fm/~1cvxc
In the name of a good time...This is so old school it is really PRE-school (LOL)! ♫ http://blip.fm/~1cvkg
